Package main.domain.collaborativeRecommender

Class Summary
LMSCollaborativeRetrievalMethod This method returns cases depending on the recommendations of other users.
LMSMatrixCaseBase Specific implementation of CBRCaseBase to allow collaborative recommendations.
LMSPearsonMatrixCaseBase Extension of the MatrixCaseBase that computes similarities among neighbors using the Pearson Correlation.
LMSRecommender Single-Shot learning objects recommender in an e-learning environment (like Learning Management Systems) obtaining a description from the profile of the user and scoring cases using collaborative recommendation.
UserProfileCreater Creates the user profile.
